mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM t_menu m WHERE m.type <> 1 AND m.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM t_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN t_role r ON (rm.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (ur.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN t_user u ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) WHERE u.username = #{username} ) ORDER BY m.order_num
